name: Dino Run 3D (itch) (Danidan)
description:
This game was made as part of the Unity Game Scripting course at Saxion University. This game was inspired by the Offline Chrome Dino Game.   

This is the first-ever game I made in Unity, so it's a little janky. 

The Web version's SFX don't  work properly, and it's a bit laggy so you might want to download it for the best experience. 

If you resize the screen on the downloadable version the UI will not work properly, so I recommend you play windowed.

Controls:

  • A & D - Move
  • SPACE- Jump
  • L  - Shoot
  • ENTER- Play/Replay Level
  • ECS or Q -  Exit Game

As the focus of the project was on programming, I used free visual assets. None of the models, textures, sounds, music, icons, and so on belong to me.
